fr.umlv.jphoto
Interface Transition

All Known Implementing Classes:
CenterTransition, DTransition, TLaurentDrix, TPicture
public interface Transition

Represents a transition in the animation. The life cycle of a transition followed these steps :

  • step 1: initialization, call init, process ressources needed during step 2
  • step 2: draw the transition in a loop, draw is called at fixed rate during the duration of the transition.
    each time, the elapsed time between when the transition beginning and the current time is provided.
  • step 3: free ressources calculated during step 1
  • step 4: could replay step 1 to 3.

      Author:
      Remi Forax

      init the transition.

      Parameters:
      config - contains all properties needed by the transition.

      draw

      void draw(long time,
          java.awt.Graphics2D graphics)
      draw a frame of the transition. This method render only one frame of the transition.

      Parameters:
      time - a time is millisecond between 0 and the duration of the transition
      graphics - graphics which to draw on

      dispose

      void dispose()
      free ressources allocated in init.

      See Also:
